sense.def:
To whimper
pomeni spuščati kratke, tihe, žalostne glasove, kot recimo otroci ali živali.

seg.quote: You don't have to feed the baby the minute she whimpers.
I was listening for a cry or a whimper from upstairs.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
whimpers something
, nekaj reče z nesrečnim ali preplašenim glasom.

seg.quote: ‘I want to go home,’ she whimpered.
